alert.note: Alert for Lander; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 14 at 2:33PM PDT until September 14 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nevada and south central Nevada, including the following counties, in north central Nevada, Lander. In south central Nevada, Nye. * WHEN...Until 545 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 233 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.8 and 1.1 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Washington Creek, Knox Creek and Reese River. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.4 to 0.7 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Lander and Nye Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
